about_the_game:
Are you ready to experience an exciting adventure in a new Time Management game? Step into the 19th century world of lavish balls, aristocratic intrigues, and handsome bachelors. Can you organize a wedding that will be the talk of the town? But don't forget to take care of your own heart amidst all the chaos.

In the game, you play the role of Emily, an aspiring maid, who takes on the challenge of organizing a wedding for her friend Jane. But what she thought would be a simple task turns out to be more demanding and complicated than she ever expected.

As you progress through the game, you will have to make decisions on your own terms, set boundaries, and learn to treat yourself well. You will be responsible for everything from organizing the wedding dress to the wedding rings. And it's not just about pleasing your friend Jane, but also convincing the elegant crowd that what you have planned is worth their attendance.

As the game progresses, things become more complicated when an eccentric squire, a charismatic butler, and a charming captain come into the picture. Can you royal match the couples? Can you keep up with all the demands and surprises that come your way?

Forget burgers and pizzas in restaurants; serve some high-end food to your guests in palaces.

Get ready to immerse yourself in the 19th-century world of love, passion, and romance. And remember, even in the midst of all the chaos, you have the power to fight for your own happiness.
Break conventions by playing a strong female character who cares about others. Here, the heroines can save themselves and say "no"!

FEATURES:
❤️ Organize the most beautiful wedding in town
❤️ Immerse yourself in 60 levels
❤️ Addictive storyline
❤️ Five beautiful locations
❤️ Feel like royalty and attend a lavish ball
❤️ New mini-games
❤️ 3 difficulty levels
❤️ Time Management fun

Support Emily in her fight for happiness and love

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.7 or higher
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo 2GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 512 MB available space

name: Secret Diaries - Royal Wedding

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo 2GHz
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 512 MB available space

short_description: Attend lavish balls and meet handsome bachelors in the new Time Management game!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Portuguese - Brazil
